name: Luonnossa Girls Lilac Flower Vest
description:
From the Trees and Lovers... Our Luonnossa line of childrens clothing is beginning to take shape. We are offering one of a kind, organic, natural hand dyed and deconstructionist vests for your little ones...

All of our products are done in a Scandinavian folk palette. Currently, our foundation colors are cool lilac-rose, natural, blue-gray, rusty-rose and natural brown. 

The vests are made with organic cotton. The edges sewn but not detailed. Expect slight fraying upon washing. This is intentional and we think the end result is lovely. 

Each batch of ten vests goes into a natural dye bath of organic edibles such as berries, beets etc. and is hand washed and machine dried for colorfastness. 

Then, up-cycled felted wool or cotton adornments are added.

We will be posting photos of vests that are available as well as examples that have been already been sold. If you would like to custom order any details such as the first letter of your child's name for a small additional charge then you can email us with your request and we will send you the deets.

(Please be aware that color will fade or mellow over time- such is the way with natural dye- We believe that even "Low impact natural dyes" aren't really low impact. They just use less water so they can coin the term "low impact".  We think that's pretty tricky.. So, In the effort to put less chemicals into the world (and even less on our children themselves) we only use natural edibles as a means to dye our products) So, hand-washing is highly recommended. You may line or dry in a machine. Hot iron when needed..

These vests are fantastic.. You should buy one or many and tell your friends..
